fields.description: (this is more used to apply some modifiers than actually rate the challenge)

fields.description: and details!

fields.description: What kind of magical item is it?

fields.description: Homebrew or just magical?

fields.description: What adventures has this NPC appeared in?

fields.label: Biography
fields.description: Who is this person?

fields.description: Does this NPC go by any nicknames or aliases? (comma separated)

fields.name: Affiliates

fields.description: Who are their closest affiliates? (comma separated)

fields.name: Factions

fields.description: Is this NPC associated with any known organization?

fields.name: Primary Location
fields.label: Primary Location
fields.description: Where does this NPC hang out?

fields.name: Alignment

fields.description: What is this NPC's Alignment

fields.name: Class
fields.description: What class is this NPC (if any)?

fields.name: Species
fields.description: What species is this NPC?

fields.name: Known Spells
fields.description: Does this NPC know any spells?

fields.name: Stats

fields.description: Does this NPC need a stat block made?

fields.name: Size
fields.label: Size
fields.description: What is the NPC's size?

fields.name: Type
fields.label: Type
fields.description: What type of creature is this NPC?

fields.description: (leave blank for randomization)

fields.name: npc_hp
fields.label: Max Hit Points
fields.description: (leave blank for randomization)

fields.label: Hit Dice
fields.description: How many of which hit dice doe this character have?(leave blank for randomization)

fields.description: Out of 20 (leave blank for randomization)

fields.description: Out of 20 (leave blank for randomization)

fields.name: npc_INT
fields.label: Intelligence Score
fields.description: Out of 20 (leave blank for randomization)

fields.name: npc_WIS

fields.description: Out of 20 (leave blank for randomization)

fields.name: npc_CHA
fields.label: Charisma Score
fields.description: Out of 20 (leave blank for randomization)

fields.label: Proficiencies
fields.description: What skills is this NPC proficient in?

fields.description: How would you describe this place to your players?

fields.description: What's the history of this location?

fields.name: world

fields.description: Roughly how big is this place.

fields.description: What's the weather like?
